Texts.Eng: A hospital bed. Unlike the Miniknog variety, this one doesn't feature straps to hold patients down...
Texts.Chs: 病床。不像科技发展部的品种，这一个没有功能带，以举行病人下来。。。

Texts.Eng: A mighty uncomfy bed, but I suppose a patient ain't got much of a choice.
Texts.Chs: 一张非常舒适的床，但我想病人没有太多选择。

Texts.Eng: As if the stiff mattress weren't bad enough, the heart monitor is just so loud...
Texts.Chs: 好像僵硬的床垫还不够糟糕，心脏监护仪的声音太大了。。。

Texts.Eng: For something you're supposed to stay in until you feel better, hospital beds are notably uncomfortable.
Texts.Chs: 对于一些你应该待在家里直到感觉好些的事情，医院的病床特别不舒服。

Texts.Eng: Little machine ssstops beeping when Floran's meal is ready!
Texts.Chs: 当叶族人的饭准备好了，小机器停止鸣叫！

Texts.Eng: Maybe if they make the bed stiff enough, the patient gets better quicker so they can get out of it?
Texts.Chs: 也许如果他们把床弄得足够僵硬，病人会更快地好转，这样他们就能从床上爬起来？

Texts.Eng: The handles near the top look like they're used to angle the head of the bed up.
Texts.Chs: 靠近顶部的把手看起来像是用来将床头向上倾斜的。
